name: Bot Buster
description:
Made for the Godot Wild Jam 51, with the theme of upgrades.

A simple game where you fight against a swarm of robots endlessly. The robots will drop upgrades that you can collect, but they will also empower your enemies.

WASD to move

Left click to attack

Right click to block

Made by:

https://itch.io/profile/thefinnigan

https://itch.io/profile/iamwood

This was the first proper game we have made, and especially so on a time limit.
